newsitem.title: SLOVENIA: Slovenia Droga says '96 net up 35.6 pct.
newsitem.headline: Slovenia Droga says '96 net up 35.6 pct.

text.p: Slovenian food maker Droga said on Friday its 1996 net profit rose 35.6 percent to 858.2 million tolars ($5.4 million) from 632.7 million a year before, exceeding its earlier forecasts of a 30 percent increase.
Droga attributed the gain to a fall in operating expenses, a 24 percent increase in sales to 11.2 billion tolars and a 33 percent rise in exports.

The company said earlier the dividend was expected to be about 30 percent higher than the 784 tolars per share paid last year. Shareholders will vote on the dividend next month. -- Marja Novak, Ljubljana newsroom, 386-61-125-8439.
